content: this legal text summarizes a notary document from july 29 2004 involving two companies gcsrl and risrl and their agreement regarding the division of a plot of land in castelfidardo the land is 19167 square meters and is divided into two parcels with one company receiving 9583 square meters and the other receiving 9584 square meters each parcel is valued at 135000000 the agreement includes provisions for ownership transfer guarantees of title availability and the establishment of servitudes for pedestrian passage and driveway access the expenses related to the agreement are to be shared equally by the two companies the document is signed by the representatives of the companies and the notary
